articles.title: Providers struggle to get latest Covid shots into arms amid early supply issues - CNBC
articles.description: Some Americans are having Covid vaccine appointments canceled or finding a pharmacy doesn't have a shot for them, as the U.S. tries an unprecedented rollout.
articles.content:
It's déjà vu for some Americans looking for the latest Covid-19 vaccines.

articles.title: NASA astronaut marks 1 year in space after breaking record for longest mission by American - ABC News
articles.description: Astronaut Frank Rubio is set to return to Earth later this month.
articles.content:
After breaking the record earlier this month for the longest continuous amount of time spent in space by an American, NASA astronaut Frank Rubio on Thursday hit one year of orbiting Earth.
